flawed_nl_solution:
50% of the vote is 1000 votes because 200 x 0.5 = <<200*0.5=1000>>1000
Just over 50% is 1001 votes because 1000 + 1 = 1001
120 students are boys because 200 x 0.6 = <<200*0.6=120>>120
80 students are girls because 200 - 120 = <<200-120=80>>80
She gets 81 votes from boys because 120 x 0.68 = <<120*0.68=81>>81
She needs 920 votes from girls because 1001 - 81 = <<1001-81=920>>920
She needs a proportion of 11.5 of girl's votes to win because 920 / 80 = <<920/80=11.5>>11.5
The percentage she needs is 1150 because 100 x 11.5 = <<100*11.5=1150>>1150
#### 1150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
